purpose: Maintains a local draft of an externally-controlled text value and syncs it back to the parent via a debounced or committed update callback
Manages a selected-item list editor's state including selection persistence to localStorage, item creation, renaming, deletion, and reordering
Renders an expandable card for configuring a single mutation rule, including its type, target entity references, and associated fields
Provides a form UI for defining how entities are selected by strategy, kind, filters, pick count, and optional subtype exclusions
Renders a form for configuring how a variable-bound entity is selected, supporting related-entity and direct-kind selection modes with optional filters
Provides a full editor panel for managing simulation systems, supporting type-filtered browsing, selection persistence, inline enable/disable toggling, and system creation via type picker
Renders a tabbed modal for editing all aspects of a simulation system including its overview, actor selection, triggers, and effects
Provides a full editor panel for managing simulation systems, supporting type-filtered browsing, selection persistence, inline enable/disable toggling, and system creation via type picker
Runs cross-domain validations across schema, eras, generators, systems, and actions and displays grouped validation issues with navigation links
Runs cross-domain validations across schema, eras, generators, systems, and actions and displays grouped validation issues with navigation links
Displays an editable matrix of per-era weights for generators or systems, allowing inline cell editing, row selection, copy-paste of weight rows, and search filtering
Renders the name generation control panel where users select a culture, entity context, and profile then generate and display sample names
Presents a modal for editing the condition filters (entity kind, subtype, tags, prominence) that determine when a naming strategy group applies
Orchestrates the browser-side name-domain optimization workflow, coordinating domain selection, algorithm settings, optimization execution, and saving results back to cultures
Renders the left-panel domain picker for the optimizer, allowing users to expand cultures and toggle individual or all domains for optimization
Displays a collapsible diff of what changed between the initial and optimized versions of a naming domain
Renders the right-panel settings form for the optimizer, exposing algorithm choice, algorithm parameters, validation thresholds, and fitness weight configuration
Shows a modal tracking optimization progress with live logs and, on completion, presents per-domain result diffs with an option to save the optimized domains
Provides a reusable modal container with a header icon, title, optional disabled badge, action buttons, and focus-trap/keyboard-dismiss behavior
Wraps content in a card that can be toggled open or closed by clicking its header, optionally passing a toggleId back to the parent handler
Renders a centered empty-state placeholder with an icon, title, optional description, and optional action content when a list has no items
Renders a labeled section header with an optional icon, description, count badge, and an optional action slot for controls like add buttons
Renders a small icon-only button with optional danger styling and a tooltip for use as an inline action trigger
Displays a styled informational callout box with an optional title and arbitrary child content
Renders a labelled button used to trigger creation of a new item in a list
Renders a collapsible category group in a sidebar list, showing an icon label with item count and toggling visibility of its child items
Renders a single row in a list with a display name, optional muted styling, optional remove button, and optional trailing content slot
Wraps a form field with a label, optional hint text, and consistent vertical spacing for use in forms
Lays out multiple form groups side-by-side in a horizontal row for compact multi-field form layouts
Renders a chip-based multi-select control where users type to filter options and selected values appear as removable chips
Renders a searchable dropdown button that filters a list of items by name and calls back with the selected item's ID
Renders a labeled select element for choosing a reference value from a flat list of options, with support for a placeholder and optional meta text per option
Renders an SVG-based segmented level selector where each segment maps to a labeled tier, with an optional numeric input for fine-grained override
Renders a toggle switch for enabling or disabling an item, showing enabled/disabled label text and calling back with the new boolean state
Renders a searchable multi-select dropdown for picking tags from a registry, supporting single-select mode, tag creation, and an optional match-all toggle
Renders a dashed-border card button used as an inline affordance to add a new item to a list
Renders a list of pressure delta inputs, one per available pressure, letting users set numeric adjustments that will be applied when a system or action fires
Displays a compact red badge with an error count, hiding itself when the count is zero
Displays a warning badge indicating an item is not referenced by any era, hiding itself when the item is not orphaned
Displays a compact badge showing the number of validation issues for a tab, hiding itself when the count is zero
Renders compact inline badges for each era an item belongs to, truncating with an overflow count when there are more than the visible maximum
Renders per-tool usage count badges (e.g. NameForge, Coherence Engine) for a config element, optionally in compact icon-only mode
Renders a set of badges listing which specific generators, systems, or other items reference a given element, with an orphan indicator when nothing references it
Maintains a local draft of an externally-controlled text value and syncs it back to the parent via a debounced or committed update callback
Manages a selected-item list editor's state including selection persistence to localStorage, item creation, renaming, deletion, and reordering
Renders a sidebar listing all cultures with inline creation of new cultures, selection highlighting, and optional read-only mode
Renders the main workspace panel for a selected culture, displaying a tabbed interface for domains, lexemes, grammars, and profiles with an empty-selection prompt when no culture is chosen
Manages the list of naming domains for a culture, supporting create, edit, delete, copy-from-another-culture, and section-level expand/collapse of domain detail panels
Manages a culture's lexeme lists, letting users browse, create via AI-generated spec or manual entry, edit existing specs, and copy lexeme lists from other cultures
Manages a culture's grammar rules, supporting create, edit, delete, and copy-from-another-culture with a reference help panel and rule-level editing
Manages a culture's naming profiles, showing each profile with its generator usage summary and opening a modal editor for creating or modifying profiles
Renders a compact list card for an action showing its enable state, pressure modifier count, validation errors, and orphan status
Renders a compact list card for an action showing its enable state, pressure modifier count, validation errors, and orphan status
Renders a tabbed modal for editing all aspects of an agent action including its overview, actor selection, instigator configuration, trigger conditions, and outcome effects
